lcn.p: Once the Council is satisfied that the applicant is fit and ready to be part of the metatemple, let the new member of the metatemple be added to the interior network and introduced to the rest of the metatemple. Yet even at this point, the new member may not be allowed to take lifetime vows, but may at first continue renewing them monthly. When zie is ready, zie may transition to renewing for three month periods, for full years, and even three-year periods. Only when zie is certain, after extensive discernment, may anyone be permitted to make lifetime vows.
